name: Welcome To Hotel Meow
description:
Being a cat is hard work. Always looking slightly annoyed, angrily watching birds, and throwing over your humans' valuable possessions only include some of the daily chores a good cat has to balance. And this is why you should come to visit Hotel Meow! Enjoy comfortable rooms, exquisite food, and our vast entertainment options: Take a stroll though out catnip gardens or drink a warm cup of milk at the bar.

We here at Hotel Meow are excited for your visit! Meow!

"Welcome to Hotel Meow!" is a game about managing a cat hotel. Build guestrooms, restaurants, cinemas, and much more. Manage your staff and satisfy your cat guests' expectations.

If you experience performance issues in the browser version or you plan on building a skyscraper sized hotel, we recommend you download the windows version.

This is somewhat of an early access version. We will be continuing to make a full release called "Welcome to Hotel Meow: Purrfect Edition" after Christmas and release it here and on steam. We'd love to hear any feedback and Ideas you might have for updates and the full release next year.

This game was made for the Secret Santa Jam 2022.
